Name: Beat Your Meat
About the game: GET YOUR CHOPS OFF WITH BEAT YOUR MEAT! Are you and up to three porcine pals ready to jump into the world of Beat Your Meat? Jump into a variety of fast paced and wacky game modes as you beat your way to the top, and remember - size matters! As you battle it out you'll find that hitting your foes causes them to shrink and drop a variety of delicious pork products, collecting these meats will cause you to grow! But beware as the larger you are the slower you become! Fight in Style! Dress your pigs in a variety of outfits from a wide array of hats and shirts! Mix it up! There are a wide variety of powerups that will appear in the area over the course of the game that you can use to gain the upper hand on your opponents! Smash open the power-up orbs to gain a powerful new ability to swing the game in your favour! Features: 5 Game Modes 7 Maps 9 Powerups 50+ Hats and Shirts Inspired By: Gang Beasts Speedrunners Genital Jousting Magicka Super Smash Brothers Brawlhalla Stick Fight The Game
